metadata.title: CVE-2021-46965 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mtd:physmap: physmap-bt1-rom: Fix unintentional stack access Cast &data to(char *) in order to avoid unintentionally accessing the stack. Notice thatdata is of type u32, so any increment to &data will be in the order of4-byte chunks, and this piece of code is actually intended to be a byteoffset. Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1497765 ("Out-of-bounds access")

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
